title: Pixel 3 Pixel 3 XL OEM Unlocking ungreying
content:
Isnâ€™t it possible for Google to in the next software update of Pixel 3 Pixle 3 XL to include a signed bootloader that does way with the OEM Unlocking greyed-out issue?
